abandoned: I don't understand what you mean

abandoned: Our mission: to enable everyone, everywhere to understand the world and express themselves across languages.
lɛf: Wi wok: fɔ mek ɔlman ɔlsay na di wɔl ebul fɔ ɔndastand dɛnsɛf ɛn tɔk to dɛnsɛf.

abandoned: Our mission: to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.

tek wan pɔsin bɛtɛ pas ɔda pɔsin
